item.title: Problems with a quest
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

If this is in client.java

public void q1help() { sendQuest("Lost city", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); if (q1 == 0) { sendQuest("I can start this quest by talking to the Warrior.", 8147); sendQuest("He is located near a training place.", 8148); sendQuest("", 8149); sendQuest("", 8150); } if (q1 == 1) { sendQuest("The Warrior says something about 'Zanaris'", 8147); sendQuest("I should head to Falador to get some information.", 8148); sendQuest("", 8149); sendQuest("", 8150); } if (q1 == 2) { sendQuest("The Archer at Falador says I will need a dramen staff.", 8147); sendQuest("I can get one at Entrana, but where in Entrana?", 8148); sendQuest("", 8149); sendQuest("", 8150); } if (q1 == 3) { sendQuest("I can now cut down the Dramen tree.", 8147); sendQuest( "When I have the staff, I should search for the lost city.", 8148); sendQuest("", 8149); sendQuest("", 8150); } if (q1 == 15) { sendQuest("I have completed the quest!", 8147); sendQuest("I can now visit Zanaris.", 8148); sendQuest("", 8149); sendQuest("", 8150); } sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

And this is in clickingmost.

case 28164: c.q1help(); break;

And q1 is being saved in your character file, it WILL work.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with a quest
item.dc:creator: @wonderspring wonderspring
item.description:
@wonderspring wrote:

I’m trying to make lost city to work…
Everything is fine but when i go to the quest tab and i press on Lost City quest nothing will pop-up …
in clickingmost.java at case 28164(quest case) i only have this:

*case 28164: c.showInterface(8134); break;
I tried in many ways to make it works like :
[/code]c.showInterface(8134);

c.sendFrame126("",8136);

c.sendFrame126("",8137);

c.sendFrame126(" ",8138);[/code]
But nothing … and whats with this thing from client.java ?!

public void q1help() { sendQuest("Lost city", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); if(q1 == 0){ sendQuest("I can start this quest by talking to the Warrior.", 8147); sendQuest("He is located near a training place.", 8148); sendQuest("", 8149); sendQuest("", 8150); } if(q1 == 1){ sendQuest("The Warrior says something about 'Zanaris'", 8147); sendQuest("I should head to Falador to get some information.", 8148); sendQuest("", 8149); sendQuest("", 8150); } if(q1 == 2){ sendQuest("The Archer at Falador says I will need a dramen staff.", 8147); sendQuest("I can get one at Entrana, but where in Entrana?", 8148); sendQuest("", 8149); sendQuest("", 8150); } if(q1 == 3){ sendQuest("I can now cut down the Dramen tree.", 8147); sendQuest("When I have the staff, I should search for the lost city.", 8148); sendQuest("", 8149); sendQuest("", 8150); } if(q1 == 15){ sendQuest("I have completed the quest!", 8147); sendQuest("I can now visit Zanaris.", 8148); sendQuest("", 8149); sendQuest("", 8150); } sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

Its that thing the right code to show the interface when i click on Lost City quest ?!
If yes how can i make it works when i click on button 28164(quest button)

Thanks and please reply.

Read full topic
